participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Ethan is focused on his goals both in sports and academics. He is friendly but tends to be shy around new people.
participant_1.background: I recently made the college baseball team. My favorite player is Mike Trout. I am going to be the starting shortstop. I am 19 years old.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is a dreamer with a romantic outlook on life. Despite her struggles with motivation and relationships, she is optimistic and values connections with friends.
participant_2.background: I daydream during work. I have bad luck with relationships. I have trouble getting motivated. I slack off on my homework. I am a hopeless romantic.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_1. I'm 19 and I just made the college baseball team!
Nice! I'm participant_2. I'm 21 and I work as a waitress.
Oh, cool. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I like the people I work with, but I hate the customers.
I know what you mean. I've always been a little shy, so I'm not great with customers.
Me too! I'm always so worried about saying the wrong thing.
But you're really good at your job! I've seen you handle some really difficult customers.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go out to dinner with my friends, go to the movies, and read romance novels.
I like to go out to dinner too, but I'm not a big fan of romance novels.
Oh, what do you like to read?
I like to read nonfiction books about history and science.
That's cool. I've never really been a big reader, but I'm trying to get more into it.
You should! It's a great way to learn new things and relax.
I know, I know. I'm going to start reading more once I have more time.
Good! And maybe we can read some books together sometime.
